snippet: The comedian’s web series will offer a different take on the making of a New York City crime drama, with guest stars including Jerry Seinfeld and Amy Schumer.
abstract: The comedian’s web series will offer a different take on the making of a New York City crime drama, with guest stars including Jerry Seinfeld and Amy Schumer.

headline.main: Colin Quinn's Streaming 'Cop Show' to Satirize Police Dramas
